values:
Whence comes the wind that blows softly through the trees?  
And wither doth it go?  
Yet in its gentle passing do we not feel it's soft velvet touch upon our check?
Like the flutter of a butterflys wings, now senced, now lost!
For all it's reality we cannot reach out and touch, and grasp, the wind.  It is there, yet it is not!  How real too is our sence of sight when we see, in dreams, the ones we love.  Again we see them and talk with them, and love again.  Yet are they there?  Will they come when we call?  Can we see and do what we will?  Yes and yes again, tis true?  All that which we desire to see, to experience, in our dreams, is ours for the asking will and it shall come.  Ask and it shall be given.  know that the power is within us and all that we desire shallbe ours.

Just fucking with me, just fuck.fuck.fuck If your just coming over to fuck me don't even bother. I can find plenty of guys to just "fuck". But you see with you I want more than that. It seems to me were more than that. Something more passionate, something like love. Something like commitment. Something you just don't seem to understand. I love you with my heart, why doesn't that seem good enough. Well worry no longer because that will never happen again. I shouldn't have to explain myself, you should know how I fell.

Fuck.Fuck.fuck. Everything that you stand for.
 
 Well what to start off with. hum. I have'nt had a sober day in about three weeks. It's wake up get high,get high,get high. Go to work high. Leave work it high. If I have work in the mornings I pull myself out of bed maybe take a couple hits off a pipe, go in to work, work my ass off, get off work go home take a shower go get high take some pills uppers downers whatever I can get or got, get high as much as I can or until I have to be home, come home and then go to bed. I hav'nt been eating much lately I'm trying to lose weight and not eat sonic food as much as I can.
 
 I have a "boyfriend" Steph was trying to get us "talking" something to do when I'm board or just someone cool to chill with, ha. He automatically thought we were going out. We never talked about going out or anything like that!! I only hung out with him a couple of times and usually Steph was there. It was fuck up right?.  So I was like whatever, hes only seventeen going to be eighteen soon. I know young. But he is pretty cute, and funny as hell. It's funny I really don't know if I like him like that or not. I'm thinking hes cool to hang out with buts thats it. But I mean hell Stephen told me to just get over it. 
 
 Well you know what fuck him. He loves me but cant be with me. Yeah ok is that code for I want you but I want alot of other girls to and I dont want to have to deal with you. ahhh. I'm mean what the fuck is that. I think about having sex with other girls when I'm with you because your love is'nt good enough for me or you don't give me everything I need. You have some issues. But I want you to chang yourself into someone I think you are. In only a couple of mons, when I been like this ever since I was about 3. I mean I'm 19 years old going to be twenty in about fives months, I don't need anything to sirius right now, I mean I want to be able to party with people, have fun. Just because you have a problem with those people does'nt mean that I have to, too. 
 
 I do want something to be there. Like just being good friends. Someone to told you when your sad, to tell you every things going to be ok. just someone, someone to keep you sane,someone to slap you or call you a bitch when your going crazy because everyone around you gives you new ideas of how things are and should, will, or supposed to be. And sometimes there thoughts get stuck on me and every time that happens it just piles more and more thoughts in me and then the more confused I get. Like a foggy cloud you can't see where your going. I feel like I'm going insane. I feel like I have'nt stopped in days.  
 
Well fuck in the words of Robert-thats how it goes.

I can't stop thinking. Things I would do and I just sit here blank listening to Staind-Chapter V-2nd song.Right Here. I have dedicated this song to Stephen.

I know I've been mistaken
But just give me a break and see the changes that I've made
I've got some imperfections
But how can you collect them all and throw them in my face

But you always find a way to keep me right here waiting
You always find the words to say to keep me right here waiting
And if you chose to walk away I'd still be right here waiting
Searching for the things to say to keep you right here waiting

I hope you're not intending
To be so condescending it's as much as i can take
and you're so independent
you just refuse to bend so I keep bending till I break

But you always find a way to keep me right here waiting
You always find the words to say to keep me right here waiting
And if you chose to walk away I'd still be right here waiting
Searching for the things to say to keep you right here waiting

I've made a commitment
I'm willing to bleed for you
I needed fulfillment
I found what I need in you

Why can't you just forgive me
I don't want to relive all the mistakes I've made along the way
But I always find a way to keep you right here waiting
I always find the words to say to keep you right here waiting

But you always find a way
To keep me right here waiting
You always find the words to say to keep me right here waiting
And if I chose to walk away would you be right here waiting
Searching for the things to say to keep me right here waiting

Your sitting next to me on the bed trying to talk to each other calmly .... I look into your eyes, As I'm thinking of thing I would love to do to you. I can't take another second of you not touching me,I grab your head and pull it toward mine, I start to kiss you, my body starts to get hot, I have this warm tingling sensation coming over my body because of the way your touching me,I have never felt this feeling,until I found you, It's like were almost melting into each other . You throw me on the bed, we start to rip each others clothes off you start making love to me and there's a warm wave of sensation coming over my body like waves, and we have felt one another. We get up and get dressed not really saying to much to each other. But you know were thinking were thinking the same thing. 


It was crazy two people making love. Do you think it brings people closer? I mean it's very personal to experience that with with some. To open yourself to someone that much. Committing yourself in that way. I experienced that with the person I love. And now I wish I had'nt. I mean yes I gaven myself up before. But not like this. It felt to be so in love with everything. To feel that way with someone. Was incredible. To know the person you were making love to loved you the same. What I would give for just a hug, for you to hold me your arms your arms again.  Tell me it's going to be ok.

I take a deep breath in, tears start rolling down my check, I can't understand why everyone I care about just fucks me in the end, they end up hurting me in some way. I lost my best friend. I am an emotional freak who bottles averything up inside of me until I freak out. It ain't pretty. And it's usually on Stephen. I can't show the people I care about the most my true emotions because I'm scared. Fuck, show  people I care about,lets try I can't really show anyone my true feelings.He says he does'nt know me. But he was with me for so long. He said he was'nt happy being with me any more. I guess he wanted something new. We can't be "friends" because I love him to much, I'd get mad if he was with another girl. I don't understand where I lost myself. I am not the same person I was when I meet him. He wanted to try and help me so I could beable to tell him how I felt, I guess he got sick of helping me. I don't understand why this is such a problem. This is the second person I have lost to this. What the fuck is worng with me. Why can't I tell people how I really fell? Fuck this life.

Today, Today where the fuck has my day went. Sleep work sleep work, as my eyes twich.  God I feel crazy! It's be a year since I've been in PA. Blah Blah has happened to me. INLOVE. The most crazy, charming, sexy, loving, hugging, smart, talented, twisted, playful, physco, caring, thoughtful, intresting, superb in bed ;)
boy.

The past three or four days have been very good to me. I have'nt gotten that much sleep due to working. But I funally got my beer!! Yumm. It was the best one I've ever had. I went to the movies last night to see Ancor man (sp?). It sucked don't go to see it. I alos got Otep- House of Secrets. I do say buy this cd. It's rocking my world.  well thats all.

I've have missed out on so much. I have learned so much. I have forgotten alot. I feel alone. All I think about is what I have been though. Were I'm going next in my life. I feel like just running away and hiding from the world. But what would it change abolsutly nothing. I'd still be alone. I hate people that get in my way. What I would do for even a hug right now. I miss my friends so much. When I felt these ways I could just walk across the street to my "LOVE". Or I could just call a fiend on the phone and talk about my problems. But now is differant I don't know what I want, how I feel. I just don't know what to think. And I'm a hundred miles away, it's differant. I just miss everything. 

"Who's sleeping on my side of the bed tonight. HAVE YOU EVER CRIED SO HARD? Whos sleeping on my side of the bed tonight. Baby you just died." "There she goes another masquerade in false circumstance.""SHE CAME AND WENT,MAKE UP SMEARED IN HER EYES,EACH SOBS A REASON TO SAY GOODBYE."

"DEAD LOVERS EYES."
Well thas all I have to rant about tonight.

I just go out of work. Only five hours, but I got about 20$$ in tips. Hoot Hoot. It's been really boring around here. I yet hav'nt got to hang out with anyone. Although the peace and quite (no fighting) is a good change.

I finally got on-line, I am a miserable mess.

So what would you do??

I got to see my mother after four years. And she tells me she wants me to meet this guy (i don't remember his name). I say ok why, she did'nt want to tell me because she thought I would get upset. I thought to myself how bad could this be. I'm used to bad things so bring it on bitch. joke. I made her tell me. WELL.. A long time ago her and my father had a fight she left him for two weeks, some guy came to her rescue (the guy she wanted me to meet). Well her and this guy had sex. She and my father had got back together. In this period of two weeks she came up pregnant, yes with me. So I may not have the father I thought I had. There are other people that know this also. And some say I look and act like alot of that family. 

Whats a girl to do. Do I meet this guy, or just say no and foget about it.

Anyway.. I finally have a job. I work at Sonic now. I hate it. It's a job. I have no fiends. Sit at home all the time. Alone.

This is the happiest I've been in along time and I love it. I'm going to be getting a kitten soon, very soon. I can't wait. I went to the prom last Friday. I hated it. I guess not my choice of things to do. The food sucked. Music sucked, I did'nt know anyone there. A couple of really hot guys though. Boys, boys, boys. I love it. School is dragging. We got are caps and gowns. I am having a graduation party June 12th anyone who wants to come is invited, since there I really don't have many friends to invite. Just a select few. A couple of us went to Twist for the drag show last night. That was a really fun time. Danny B. was there, he kept hanging on me and telling me he loved me and how much he missed me. And he says hes not gay.I beg to differ. All in alal was fun. The bizarres are coming up soon. I love going to bizarres. Today is Craigs birthday!! HAPPY BIRTHDAY CRAIG!!

It's been a really lazy weekend. Court dyed my hair a while ago. I'm going to the valley west prom Friday. I get to get all dressed up and shit. yuck. I really don't want to go. about 28 or so more days of school left. Around June 17th I'll be leaving for awhile. I hav'nt told my father yet. Then I might be moving to Cali with Court and Bonito, if they are still going. 


She shot herself in the head, the fucking head. Good she deserved to die away. 
Like a fly on the wall no one really noticed her.
Hurt by everyone shes loved.
And now gone, no good-byes.
Hopefully one day they will see she may have been something special to them but no more.

He looked into her eyes, slit her throat, then licked the blood off of her neck as she laid there dying.  That is special.

Ah so nothing is happening. We might go to dan's later. I have felt so weird the past couple of days. Like I really hate myself for some reason. I feel very out of place with everything, everyone. I hav'nt showered in a day or two, what a scum. I don't look good in anythiing. I guess thats just a girl for ya. I feel sick, I feel really fat, and I just got done eatting a cheese burger. I been writing a lot, to get some of my anger, sadness out. It's acually helping me. And then my friendships are helping to. I will miss them.

I saw Court and Bonito's new pet rat. It's so cute unfortunitly it got hurt. But it will be o-k. Fuck you, you fucking scum bag. I hate you so much. My dad and Lori are getting along pretty good. Thats something new. Though she probly just wants something material.

things have been running pretty smooth. I spent the weekend at courts house, fun. I went shopping with erica yesterday, Thank you for the stuff!! I love the shoes the most. I have school tomorrow. I'm almost free, I can't wait. I still have about a ninety average, so I will definitely pass. Soon I'm off to college. I still don't know were I'm going yet. a tech school is were I want to go but who knows were life will take me.

I just got back from Twist, Brandi, Nate, Kyle, Bonito, Court, Erica, and myself. Dan could'nt join us, he had work. We had a freaky good time. Got to see some wht of a girls, yeah ya know. Her tit to. No class at all. But all in all fun. Tomorrow I get to go shopping with Erica, were going to Sally's. I'm alos going to the prom. Valley west's though. This should be interesting. Schools almost over and I'm still pulling about a 90 average. It's coming stright out my ass. But whatever. Brandi has finally moved into Courts. Fun times will be had. I might be going to get my nose pierced again soon. I think I want to. Thats all Folks.

So I was informed yesterday that if this PFA goes through with my father and lori that my grandmother is going to take us back to texas. Which means if this happens I won't be finishing high school. I don't know what to do. Should I stay here to finish or go? If I stay how will I get to Texas? Why does life have to be so complicated?

Last night was girls night out. Courtney, Brandy, Erica, and I. First, we went to play pool. There were asshole meat head guys there. Courtney and Brandy told them they were bi so they would'nt bother them. They were like an exbit. They were like kiss, kiss, kiss. They would'nt. Then they started talking about there mustangs. Just like boys. I hate boys :p Then it was off to Denny's good food, some pretty hot guys hehe. A couple of little fights started. It was pretty funny.


I still don't know what is happening with my dad and Lori. But my father is driving me nuts. I feel so bad for him, b/c he's all sad, and hurt. I know how it feels. I really want to help him but I really can't. Lori has a PFA on him right now. He keeps wanting me to talk to her. We all know how hard it is for me to talk to people and how bad I am at it. There was talk of him going anger counciling and aaa. Which I think will benefit. If he goes through with it. 

38 more days until I'm out of school. 

I MISS YOU SO MUCH!!!!

Courtney, Arron, Bonito, Dan, Kyle, and I went to the woodlands. Kyle left before he even got into the door. Which I should of done the same. Bonito, Aaron, and I had no fun. We could'nt move, far to getto, did'nt fit in at all, WOW and all the hoochie mama's. "It's a meat market." haha. There were some hot girls though. Guys were ewwww. Dan and Courtney will probley be the only one's going back. Sorry. 

Dan, Kyle, and I are going to have sex together Sat. They are going to eat frosted mini weates off my back. And were going to have someone video tape it. hehe
This should be interesting.     JOKE

Don't really know whats up for tonight. Noone can think of anything to do, so if any one has suggestions and it does'nt cost a lot let me know.

wow that was really boring. oh well

wow so i hav'nt updated in a while. Everything is going from bad to worse. I have to now go to court tuesday b/c of my father and lori. depending on what happens there i have no clue what i'm going to do. I'll probely be staying at courts for a while, I have no where else to go :( no family. Thank you and courts mom for letting me stay. Until after graduation any ways, 40 more days, Then it's either Las Vagas or to my gradmothers for me. I'm really hoping for las vagas. I can't live here any more. I will miss you court and erica, which are the only two people I really don't want to leave. But this place is nothing but hell for me. I'm going now where and fast. i've been writing a lot about past things basically putting my self down. And I sit back and wonder why am I doing this to myself. It's bullshit really.

So I'm a slut now. Ha Is it me dating jenn ha *wink, wink*j/k or is it the many guys I'm fucking. hmmmm. I wonder? Does it matter no. Any way. i'm eatting giant pizza flavored gold fish yumm. lauren is awesome.

Thats me :'(Not having a good day. But it's all good. Some girl wants to beat me up because I want her boyfriend or something. I'm not going to lie I'd do want him. hehe. He's cute but I would'nt steal him from her, though I probably could, but I would'nt do that. I don't think. hehe NO I would'nt. I'm going to wait until she breaks up with him. I can't wait to get drunk this weekend well Fri. I think I have plans for Sat. (LIZ). If that does'nt happen I might go to see Moustache--is fun for the whole family. I don't know yet. Courtney has'nt really been around. How you doing Court? Hav'nt talked to you in a while. I have a little crush on someone. I feel like a little girl. ha It's fun. It's going to take some time for that to work out for me, he has a girlfriend. She's a virgin slut. THat's what some folks are telling me, you can't believe everything you hear. Hey, I'm getting my permit this weekend. James made me nervous over it. "The actual driving test is the hard part". AHHHH. I'm scared. I hav'nt even really looked at the driving book yet. I should really do that. OHHHHHH, friends, I got a PASS on my Senior Project presentation. yea. Now I can just bullshit the rest of school this year. We do have Finals coming up sometime, does'nt really bother me. 
I have been really putting myself down a lot. I really try not to but what do you do when you hate someone so much. It really sucks. Some girl in school thinks I'm a lesbian. Dammit I'm not a lesbian. I wish, girls are hott man!!! Ex me:(  But what ae you gonna do.

Ah life is good. I feel like I'm on top of the world. Or mabey it's just the drugs I'm taking. Whatever I still feel good. 
::laughs uncontrolably:: I love it. I got new shoes yesterday. ah There bright blue. I love it. I don't even feel like i'm wearing shoes right now. I feel like doing somethng crazy. Like jumping off the roof of this fucking hell hole. I am going to hump you harder than god thought possible, then throw you out the window.

I've lived, I've definately learnd, And one day hopefully I'll be loved again.

Ah love is like death. It's yummy at times, then comes the bad, and no matter how bad you want it back. You can't have it. And would like to express my uttermost gratitude, in saying that I am very happy for you. Although there are some things I would still like to get off my chest with you. If you would let me. Are friendship meens a lot and I will not fuck it up by being a jealous bitch. 
Ah love that's all I have got to say. I still have a lot of love for you. Believe me or not. And one day I hope to be "one of the guys", if you'll let me.  Today I am getting out of school eraly 10:10 to be exact. Hey Court I weighed myself 98 now. I gained like two puonds. hehe
James don't forget to give me a call :p

Today I got to watch Pirates of the Carribean in school. That made my day. Today is going great, so far. I have a lot of worries and shit that I should care about but wright now I don't. Presentations are tomorrow, I have to come in at 1:30 for mine. Then after wards I am getting really drunk, well I better be any way. I posed last night for Ericas Senior project pictures she needed. It was fun, girlie. Ben's birthday was yesterday we just had cake and shit for him. His real party is on Sunday. Oh god lots of little children running around every where. aaaaaahhhh. I just can't wait to get home and eat some of that cake. yum. I'm also feeling really weird today. I can't really tell how I feel. I still have so much on my mind. But I don't at the same time. Or do I just not care? I hope that is the case and I never care about anything ever again. At least to the point it won't hurt or make me hungry.yumm food.

WOW this life is being more and more worthless to me as time goes by. Someone had told me that sometimes you need to just give up on somethings. I think I might, I am always so worried about how I treat everyone else, how everyone else feels and trying to help them. I have forgotten about me. I know how I feel, but how to deal with it. I don't know. Sometimes I wonder if anyone has ever wanted something so bad it makes them insane. I have, I am wright now. And then to just give up on it. I can't. I just want to be happy, for a little while. I wish I could tell people(someone)how I really feel (more than I have said). But its hard knowing how he feels towards other people to do that. And if I did say what I had to, would it matter, confessing my love and it does'nt even matter.
